## My favorite equation

The PDF of the normal distribution is given by the formula: $f(x | \mu, \sigma^2) = \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}} e^{ -\frac{(x - \mu)^2}{2\sigma^2} }$

## What most classmates don't know

Two summers ago I went to the Shetland Islands in Scotland. On the boat back there were hundreds of puffins following the Ferry. However, I was inside for most of the time because I was so hungry from hiking there. I ate three full diners.
